description: This operation updates the settings of a recovery point index. Required: BackupVaultName, RecoveryPointArn, and IAMRoleArn.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created. Accepted characters include lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

parameters.name: RecoveryPointArn
parameters.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

parameters.name: IamRoleArn
parameters.description: This specifies the IAM role ARN used for this operation. For example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index can have 1 of 2 possible values, either ENABLED or DISABLED. To create a backup index for an eligible ACTIVE recovery point that does not yet have a backup index, set value to ENABLED. To delete a backup index, set value to DISABLED.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: IndexStatus
nested_items.description: This is the current status for the backup index associated with the specified recovery point.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: Index can have 1 of 2 possible values, either ENABLED or DISABLED.
